title: vIra vaDivEl
sahitya:
vIra vaDivEl murugan kAppAn visanattai viDau manamE


anupallavi

  dArugar serukkinai taghartta parama shivan tanda kanal maindan kandan SaNmukha guhan


caraNam 1    kOpap-paghaik-kulattaik-kutti erivAn avan koDumaiyaik-kumaittiDa shakti taruvAn
shApap-pisAcugaLai sADi midippAn enrum shattiyarai dayai vaittu madippAn jaya
    caraNam 2    AnkArak-seukkinri nIngAdu vaNanguvOm accam tavirttiDum aruLukk-iNanguvOm
OmkAra rahasiyam Odum vEdap-pulavan uLLanbar nenjirirk-kuDi koLLum karuNai vaLLal
